title: Ryze Q cd reset BUG!
body:
Ryze's E is supposed to reset his Q cd timer. So at a random stage in the game i Q, then E to reset his Q cd but it does not happen and i have to wait the full Q or for another E cd.

Hard to reconstruct the Bug. but it happens almost every game at least once or twice, though isolated not persistent. If the bug occurs in an all in, i might lose a fight i would have won without the bug, which may very well decide a game.{{champion:13}} {{item:3070}} 

vimeo.com/243218817

Watch the Video. (EUW Preseason Plat Footage) As i use my E to kill a minion and spread Flux i try to Q and it seems like the animation gets cancelled or something. Mana is being used as seen in the -40 blue indicator, Q is on CD and no Overload animation is visible nor has any Dmg been done.

Riot pls Fix that!

Greetings, 

ChiefCeko

wow i thought the lack of traction here meant this was in my head. i sent a bug report in game too but have heard nothing.
